channel.title: Corn Bread on Chef Frank's Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Corn Bread on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Quick and Easy Chili Recipe For 200 People
item.description: Try this Quick chili recipe for school kid’s lunch or a church function. Corn bread and shredded cheddar cheese along with a saladmake this a great meal and is very affordable as well. Here’s the chili recipe for those of you cooking for a crowd: Ingredients 56# chili beans(red) ( 7 no. 10 cans) 11 qts tomato juice 30# ground beef 6 large green peppers diced 4 large spanish onions diced 2 large stalks celery diced 1 c.
